mapper.sql: id, role_name, role_code, role_type, status, remarks, creator, modifier, gmt_created, gmt_modified, is_deleted
mapper.insert:
insert into sa_role
id,
role_name,
role_code,
role_type,
status,
remarks,
creator,
modifier,
gmt_created,
gmt_modified,
is_deleted,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{roleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{roleType,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update sa_role
role_name = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
role_code = #{roleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
role_type = #{roleType,jdbcType=CHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator_id = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modifier_id = #{modifier,jdbcType=BIGINT},
gmt_created = #{gmtCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sa_role set role_name = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role_code = #{roleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role_type = #{roleType,jdbcType=CHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=BIGINT}, gmt_created = #{gmtCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
